abstract: Adds a quick action to be shown by the system when active.

declaration.code: nonisolated func accessibilityQuickAction<Style, Content>(style: Style, @ViewBuilder content: () -> Content) -> some View where Style : AccessibilityQuickActionStyle, Content : View

overview:
## Discussion

The quick action will automatically become active when the view appears. If the view is disabled, the action will defer becoming active until the view is no longer disabled.

The following example shows how to add a quick action to pause and resume a workout, with the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/AccessibilityQuickActionStyle/prompt] style.

The following example shows how to add a quick action to play and pause music, with the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/AccessibilityQuickActionStyle/outline] style.
